name: Symcon
0:
”Alexa, turn on the lights”
”Alexa, dim lights by 10 percent”
”Alexa, activate Sleep”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill supports switching, dimming, setting the color, scene activation/deactivation, getting the temperature and setting the setpoint for all devices which IP-Symcon supports.

Therefore all systems like EIB/KNX, LCN, digitalSTROM, EnOcean, eq3 HomeMatic, Eaton Xcomfort, Z-Wave, M-Bus, ModBus (e.x. WAGO SPS/Beckhoff SPS), Siemens OZW, Siemens Logo, several ALLNET devices and a lot more are compatible with Alexa using this skill. A comprehensive list 

This skill requires at least IP-Symcon 5.0 with a valid subscription and Symcon Connect has to be enabled. Additionally this PHP Module has to be installed and properly configured. (https://github.com/symcon/Alexa)

Please give feedback (also in english) in the following thread: https://www.symcon.de/forum/threads/36948
For technical help please call us or write an e-mail: https://www.symcon.de/en/contact-us/
